text:
Dear Partner,

 

We hereby inform you that this invoice No. 4402638583 is sent for your company  for information purposes.

 

Please read our new company’s informations:

 

https://fgsz.hu/en/about-fgsz/news/archive-newsletters/information-about-temporary-changes-of-invoice-sending-process.html

 

For further information please contact us at:

 

FGSZ Ltd. Finance and Management / Accounting

8600 Siófok, Tanácsház Str. 5.

e-mail: szamlazas@fgsz.hu <mailto:szamlazas@fgsz.hu> 

 

Sincerely:FGSZ Ltd.



 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ezen uzenet es annak barmely csatolt anyaga bizalmas, jogi vedelem alatt all, a nyilvanos kozlestol vedett. Az uzenetet kizarolag a cimzett, illetve az altala meghatalmazottak hasznalhatjak fel. Ha On nem az uzenet cimzettje, ugy kerjuk, hogy telefonon, vagy e-mail-ben ertesitse errol az uzenet kuldojet es torolje az uzenetet, valamint annak osszes csatolt mellekletet a rendszerebol. Ha On nem az uzenet cimzettje, abban az esetben tilos az uzenetet vagy annak barmely csatolt mellekletet lemasolnia, elmentenie, az uzenet tartalmat barkivel kozolnie vagy azzal visszaelnie. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This message and any attachment are confidential and are legally privileged. It is intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom it is addressed and others authorised to receive it. If you are not the intended recipient, please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system. Please note that any dissemination, distribution, copying or use of or reliance upon the information contained in and transmitted with this e-mail by or to anyone other than the recipient designated above by the sender is unauthorised and strictly prohibited.
